title: Tea cup and saucer
text: Unlike the massive punch bowl with related "rose medallion" decoration, the figures on this cup and saucer have been given a western appearance.
description: \"Rose Mandarin\" decoration; women and children in a pavilion on saucer, edged with fruit and flowers; women and a child in a garden on exterior of cup
creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff, by exchange
